profileAlternative.name: Elder Moraes
profileAlternative.headline: Developer Advocate at Oracle | Book Author | TDC Rockstar
profileAlternative.summary:
I help backend developers to build and deliver secure, available and fast server side applications, so they can work on great projects.

Passionate about cloud, Java and system architecture, I share my experience through online content and international events.

Regarding to international events I can mention JavaOne, Oracle Code, TDC, Campus Party, Code One and Devnexus.

My personal blog (eldermoraes.com) is where I share a lot of content about Java EE, Docker, cloud computing and career. I also write some third party articles (see eldermoraes.com/articles).

I'm a board member at SouJava, where I lead some initiatives like "Java EE 8 - The Next Frontier" and "Java@Cloud Age".

I have been working as software developer since 1999 and worked for a variety types of industries, from legal to logistics, from finance to call centers.

aboutAlternative.text:

Passionate about cloud, Java and system architecture, I share my experience through online content and international events.

positions.title: Developer Advocate
positions.description:
Helping to create awareness about Oracle tools and technologies for cloud
computing and the Java ecosystem. Inspiring developers to solve problems. Leading developers initiatives strategies across multiple teams inside Oracle.

Responsibilities:

â€¢ Creating technical content
â€¢ Speaking at technical conferences
â€¢ Engaging with developers through local meetups
â€¢ Connecting with Oracle customers to help them to be more successful in
their projects
â€¦
see more

positions.title: Member of the Board
positions.description:
Leader of the "Java EE 8 - The Next Frontier" project, a initiative with the purpose of sharing key information about Java EE 8.

What are the coolest features? What to expect in terms of migration from version 7 or even 6? Are this version suitable for microservices and/or containers? Will this version bring any career opportunities? What about the classic story "Java EE x Spring"?

For answering these and other questions we interviewed several of the top Java EE experts in the world. Spec leads, evangelists, JUG leaders and developers that live for Java EE and from Java EE.
â€¦
see more

positions.title: Senior Consultant
positions.description:
Working as ALM Consultant, helping one of our clients to automate several systems (> 50) from a varied kind of technologies (Java, .Net, Android, iOS, IBM Broker, Worklight, etc).

To meet our client needs we use a platform called Toolscloud, that runs several open source tools using Docker. Some of these tools are GitBlit, Nexus, Jenkins, Redmine, Testlink and Dashbuilder.
â€¦
see more

positions.title: Senior Architect
positions.description:
Since 1999 we are working in a variety of projects for financial, legal, call center, human resources and logistics industries.

Our mainly activities are related to systems development, consulting and architecture. We can provide solutions based on Java SE and Java EE.
â€¦
see more

positions.title: Java Developer and Team Leader
positions.description:
Working as the team leader of development and support areas, with focus on main company product: a software for law offices management. This product is developed with Java and PostgreSQL, runs on Tomcat and has a iOS version.

All developments are done with Java and Objective-C.
â€¦
see more

positions.title: Mobile Developer
positions.description: Mobile development for iOS and Android platforms, have worked mainly on business apps.

positions.title: Systems Analyst, Java Developer
positions.description:
Projects management, working in all stages of the development life cycle, from the initial analysis and including architecture definition, monitoring suppliers, deployment and post-deployment activities.

Analysis of all projects under design patterns and best practices.

Leading activities related to development methodology for credit card and payment systems (mainframe environment), coaching a team with 20 people.

Also developed a tool to support the projects activities, which works with Function Point Analysis, manages documents, gives projects statistics and registers the time sheet.
â€¦
see more

positions.title: Systems Analyst
positions.description: Responsible for modeling and development of IT solutions using MS Visual Basic, Oracle Stored Procedures and PL/SQL, MS SQL Server, as well as web solutions.
